content: here is a happy little taco to cheer up your day finished taco measures 5 1/2 inches aross **you will need…** yarn color a - red heart super saver solids in gold yarn color b - red heart super saver solids in coffee yarn color c - red heart super saver solids in spring green yarn color d - red heart super saver solids in cherry red black yarn for mouth 10mm safety eyes 3 25mm crochet hook size d fiberfill stuffing yarn needle sewing pins to hold pieces in place before sewing optional **stitches and abbreviations used…** chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet st - stitch sts - stitches repeat - repeat increase - increase 2 single_crochet in the same space decrease - decrease or decrease single_crochet 2 together
